• Generous compensation and a great benefits package that includes health, dental, vision, life insurance, disability, 401k, and paid time off
  • Stability and a comfortable work environment – Established in 1991, we are a privately-held company that is profitable and debt-free. You will enjoy a casual, flexible, team-oriented work environment
  • Sell cutting-edge technology – We have developed and continue to enhance a hosted call-center automation Solution as a Service (SaaS) offering that combines their proprietary applications with industry-leading hosted infrastructure from Aspect Communications
  • Direct access to meaningful projects – We have always been at the forefront of advanced contact center technology and participates in meaningful projects that help our customers and help society as a whole: After Hurricane Katrina, we, along with partner Siemens Communications, were asked to build and deliver a mobile 911 center and set it up in the devastated region of Plaquemines Parish, Louisiana outside New Orleans in a week to assist with recovery efforts. We are also actively involved in implementing Next Generation 911 solutions for the U.S. Department of Defense and for State, local, and international emergency operations centers.
  • Flexible Work Hours – We offer flexible work hours and supports remote work schedules as needed
